name: Shutter

screenshots.caption: Shutter in action on Windows Box.
Shutter in action on Linux Box. (Linux Mint)

short_description:
I don't know whether this happens to you or not but it happens to me every day. Generally while sleeping I love hearing songs. So I put my playlist into the mediaplayer and while hearing songs I sleep but the computer still, after playing all the songs it is in the on state. So I decided to build this Desktop App to overcome this kind of problem. I present you the Shutter App. This app has the simplest user interface and all the UI elements does what it is meant for in this app. This app can perform instant shutdown, instant logoff, instant Restart and timed Shutdown. For using timed shutdown all you have to do is to enter the time in seconds after which you want to shut your computer. 

Shutter is a very very light-weight, simplest and platform independent app, so it works flawlessly on Windows, Linux and Mac Operating Systems.
summary: Simplest desktop multiplatform app for scheduled Shutting down.
